meanings.definition: A substance that is exhaled or given off
meanings.sent1: The exhalants from the factory polluted the air.
meanings.sent2: The flowers released sweet exhalants into the garden.
meanings.sent3: The exhalants from the bakery made everyone crave pastries.
meanings.sent4: The exhalants of creativity filled the room as the artists worked.
meanings.sent5: The noxious exhalants from the chemical plant were harmful to the environment.

meanings.definition: Organisms that release gases or substances through exhalation
meanings.sent1: Marine exhalants play a crucial role in the ocean ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The exhalants of plants contribute to the balance of nature.
meanings.sent3: The exhalants of the forest creatures created a symphony of scents.
meanings.sent4: The exhalants of the volcano warned of its impending eruption.
meanings.sent5: The exhalants of the animals mingled in the fresh morning air.
